extracted_sections.section_title: Multiple document support in AI Assistant

subsection_analysis.refined_text: simplified mode allows multiple signers to assign fields to signers . if you select a signer from the right pane, the fields are assigned to the signer .

multiple document support in AI Assistant GenAl Assistant allows users to process up to 10 documents simultaneously . persistent history support also included to provide continuous access to previous interactions .
you can manage the deployment of Acrobat AI Assistant through the Adobe Admin Console . you must add users to the Admin console using one of the methods described in users .

the sign action allows the participant to enter field data and sign the agreement . up to 50 participants are supported . email is the default authentication method for confirming the identity of each participant.
if you have added multiple files, the files are converted into PDFs . the combined document is opened for you to add fields .
